title: His Ex-Wife Is A Real Problem
itunes:title: His Ex-Wife Is A Real Problem
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, My husband and I got married two years ago and we couldn't be happier. This is my first marriage his second. We have a total of five kids and one on the way. I love our blended family but my husband's ex-wife has been a problem since day one. I rarely get in my husband's dealings with his ex-wife but now I may have to.....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
